headline: Underweight Long End of Curve: BlackRock's Akullian
summary: BlackRock head of iShares Investment Strategy Kristy Akullian says they remain underweight the long end of the yield curve and like the short end. In an interview with Scarlet Fu and Eric Balchunas she says we're going to continue to see international investors allocate to the US but maybe see more of an impulse to hedge that exposure.

headline: BlackRock: ’U.S. assets still core to portfolios’
summary: Investing.com -- Despite recent volatility and Moody’s downgrade of U.S. debt, BlackRock (NYSE:BLK) says U.S. assets remain central to global portfolios.

headline: BlackRock Announces 2025 Investor Day to be Held on June 12th, 2025
summary: NEW YORK, May 19, 2025--BlackRock, Inc. (NYSE: BLK) today announced that it will host an Investor Day on Thursday, June 12th, 2025, from approximately 8:00am to 2:00pm EDT.

headline: BounceBit Pilots Bitcoin Trading Strategy Using BlackRock's BUIDL as Collateral
summary: The strategy, offering an annualized yield exceeding 24%, will be soon rolled out to institutions and retail users.

headline: Bond Investors Detect Trouble in US Debt Stripped of AAA Rating

headline: Why I Moved On From BMEZ Despite A 14.2% Yield (Rating Downgrade)
summary: BlackRock Health Sciences Term Trust's discount to NAV has narrowed sharply, eroding the original deep-value thesis. See why BMEZ is a Sell.
